section.title: Drawing Representation
section.para: A drawing is represented by a tree structure of figures.
The tree structures consists of nodes. A node can have one or no parent, and zero or more children.
The API of a tree node is defined in the interface org.jhotdraw8.collection.TreeNode.
The API of a figure is the defined in the interface org.jhotdraw8.figure.Figure.
The Figure interface extends from TreeNode.
